config.question: Jefferson’s greatest concern in purchasing Louisiana was __________.

choices.content: whether the purchase was permissible under the Constitution
whether it was in America’s interest to acquire the territory
whether the cost was excessive for his small-government philosophy
how to defend and govern the territory once it was part of the United States

answer_3.response: Jefferson worried that the purchase might be unconstitutional. The president pointed out that the Constitution did not specifically authorize acquiring vast new territories and thousands of foreign citizens. To escape this apparent legal dilemma, Jefferson proposed amending the Constitution.
